metadata.synopsis: In 1939 Ireland a new teacher (Aidan Quinn) clashes with a disciplinarian (Iain Glen) at a Roman Catholic reform school for boys.

reviews: The filmmakers undermine their point with a simplistic script that refuses to allow shades of grey in what should be a complex, disturbing story.
If this had been fictional, I probably would have been harsher on the story, but since it's a true story, what would have been a weakness can be perceived as a strength
